name: SleepSounds
0:
”Alexa open Sleep Sounds”
”Alexa ask Sleep Sounds to play rain”
”Alexa ask Sleep Sounds to play fire”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Sounds by TMSOFT plays relaxing sounds to help you relax during the day and sleep better at night. Sounds are played from our popular TMSOFT's White Noise Sleep Sounds podcast. Sleep soounds can play specific categories of sound including noise, fan, waves, rain, water, fire, wind, and storm. New sounds are added every week for you to enjoy and play continious for an entire hour. As an example, say "Alexa open Sleep Sounds and play rain." The audio will play our latest rain sound for 1 hour without interruption. For a list of all sound categories ask Sleep Sounds for help.

Check out our White Noise skill if you want to play for longer durations.

TMSOFT has been building White Noise apps for over 10 years. Visit our website at https://www.tmsoft.com/white-noise/ for more information.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
